page.title: 11MY LOCAL ENVIRONMENT 2
page.content: Our street is in an awful mess because of the buses and there are large holes in the road.There are holes beside the kerb and when people qash their cars the water gets stuck in these holes. The council have refused to fill in the large holes and have only fixed the small holes.I think this is so they can save money. I hope the bus depot is moved and the roads improved.Instead it would be nice if they built a leisure centre and a car park because the Grain Place would be a better place to live in.
